name: Duzarac
tagline: Static checker of Server-side Javascript (node.js apps)
body:
### Welcome to Duzarac!

# Checkout the code
* git clone https://github.com/rajeshr264/duzarac.git
* cd duzarac
* npm install 
* node duzarac.js --help (shows the options)

## Sample run:
* node duzarac.js -j test/data_files/test1.js -o /tmp/report.log _(report will be in: /tmp/report.log)_
* node duzarac.js -f test/data_files/js_files.txt _(report filename will be generated)_


## To run AVA tests: 
* npm install --only=dev
* npm t
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
